text:
Hey,
is there no way to add a description to templates and/or modules beyond the Label?

try this

```{% module "video"
        path="@HubSpot/video",
        offset=0,
        width=12,
        embed_field={
          "height" : 113,
          "max_height" : 113,
          "max_width" : 200,
          "oembed_response" : {
            "author_name" : "Rick Astley",
            "author_url" : "<https://www.youtube.com/@RickAstleyYT>",
            "height" : "113",
            "html" : "<iframe width=\"200\" height=\"113\" src=\"<https://www.youtube.com/embed/dQw4w9WgXcQ?feature=oembed>\" frameborder=\"0\" allow=\"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share\" allowfullscreen title=\"Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up (Official Music Video)\"></iframe>",
            "provider_name" : "YouTube",
            "provider_url" : "<https://www.youtube.com/>",
            "thumbnail_height" : "360",
            "thumbnail_url" : "<https://i.ytimg.com/vi/dQw4w9WgXcQ/hqdefault.jpg>",
            "thumbnail_width" : "480",
            "title" : "Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up (Official Music Video)",
            "type" : "video",
            "version" : "1.0",
            "width" : "200"
          },
          "oembed_url" : "<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ>",
          "size_type" : "auto_full_width",
          "source_type" : "oembed",
          "width" : 200
        }
      %}```

How you can do this is

#1 add the module to a dnd template and set the content you want
#2 Turn on dev mode by adding `?developerMode=true` to the URL
#4 just copy the dnd module and delete the rest
#5 rename `dnd_module` to `module` and give it a name `'video'`
You can skip step 4/5 if you're using a dnd template
Thanks for coming to my Ted Talk
Modules have an “Inline Help Text” field that can be found and edited in meta.json, or in the “Editor Options” group of the Design Tools right sidebar.
Request: Allow us to insert class names into Rows & Columns through the DND editor
Hello anyone here using AOS animations? how can we disable AOS on page Editor mode because it hides the section completely when the elements change
